author: Jane C. Timm
description: The suspect in the shooting of two National Guardsmen will be charged with first degree murder, the U.S.
title: National Guard shooting suspect to be charged with murder

description: President Donald Trump announced on Thursday that 20-year-old Sarah Beckstrom, one of the two soldiers shot after a gunman opened fire on National Guard members just blocks from the White House, has died. It comes as new details are emerging about the alleged shooter identified as Rahamanullah Lakanwal who will now be charged with murder in the first degree. NBC’s Melanie Zanona reports for TODAY.
title: National Guard Member Dies After Targeted Ambush in D.C.

author: Patrick Smith
description: President Donald Trump has said he will "permanently pause" all immigration from what he called "third world countries" and demanded a program of "reverse migration" as he intensified his rhetoric after the National Guard shooting in Washington, D.C.Trump offered few details as he disparaged and vowed to remove millions of migrants in the U.S., in a lengthy social media post late on Thanksgiving that came hours after he confirmed the death of National Guard troop Sarah Beckstrom, 20, in the shoo
title: Trump vows to 'permanently pause' migration from 'third world countries' after D.C. shooting

author: Suzanne Gamboa
description: SAN ANTONIO — When Immigration and Customs Enforcement came calling on Dallas Police Chief Daniel Comeaux months ago to ask his officers to assist in supporting President Donald Trump’s sweeping immigration enforcement operations, the chief of police in the third-largest city in this very red state said no. On the other hand, in Texas’ largest city, Houston Mayor John Whitmire, a Democrat, has been under fire from residents and officials since he was quoted in the Houston Chronicle acknowl
title: Texas vowed to cooperate with ICE, but its big-city police departments face a difficult choice

description: President Trump says 20-year-old Sarah Beckstrom, one of the two National Guard soldiers shot during yesterday’s attack, has died. The shooting is being investigated as an act of terror. Officials are not naming a motive, but believe the attack was targeted. NBC News’ Melanie Zanona has the story.
title: New details after targeted National Guard shooting
